Recursively collect loop guards in <code>Guards</code>, starting from block <code>Block</code> with predecessor <code>Pred</code>. <a href="#a294c573c8c94a2c7da22f8e6cc5c089b">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#a91db535be337d1fb680edfeccdfe4345">collectFromPHI</a> (ScalarEvolution &amp;SE, ScalarEvolution::LoopGuards &amp;Guards, const PHINode &amp;Phi, SmallPtrSetImpl&lt; const BasicBlock &#42; &gt; &amp;VisitedBlocks, SmallDenseMap&lt; const BasicBlock &#42;, LoopGuards &gt; &amp;IncomingGuards, unsigned Depth)</>}>
Collect loop guards in <code>Guards</code>, starting from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> <code>Phi</code>, by calling <code>collectFromBlock</code> on the incoming blocks of \\Phi and trying to merge the found constraints into a single combined one for <code>Phi</code>. <a href="#a91db535be337d1fb680edfeccdfe4345">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Private Static Functions

### collectFromBlock() {#a294c573c8c94a2c7da22f8e6cc5c089b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ScalarEvolution::LoopGuards::collectFromBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/loopguards">ScalarEvolution::LoopGuards</a> &amp; Guards, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Block, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; VisitedBlocks, unsigned Depth=0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Recursively collect loop guards in <code>Guards</code>, starting from block <code>Block</code> with predecessor <code>Pred</code>.

The intended starting point is to collect from a loop header and its predecessor.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l01321">1321</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp/#l15406">15406</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp">ScalarEvolution.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### collectFromPHI() {#a91db535be337d1fb680edfeccdfe4345}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ScalarEvolution::LoopGuards::collectFromPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/loopguards">ScalarEvolution::LoopGuards</a> &amp; Guards, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; VisitedBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/loopguards">LoopGuards</a> &gt; &amp; IncomingGuards, unsigned Depth)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Collect loop guards in <code>Guards</code>, starting from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> <code>Phi</code>, by calling <code>collectFromBlock</code> on the incoming blocks of \\Phi and trying to merge the found constraints into a single combined one for <code>Phi</code>.
